EmailTemplate.subject: Your SunPower Solar Panel Inquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
We are with SunPower© following up about your recent solar power inquiry. We're sorry to have missed you. The next step is to discuss your needs and possibly connect you with an energy consultant who will help find the SunPower© solar system that is right for your home.
This free, no-obligation appointment with a knowledgeable solar professional will answer all of your questions. The typical appointment takes place in your home and lasts about an hour. You and your energy consultant will assess your available roof space, review a custom proposal, and discuss your options.
To set up the appointment, please call us at the phone number below or simply reply to this email with a couple of times that would work best for you. We will ask a couple questions about your home, schedule the appointment, and send a confirmation to summarize the details.
Thanks again for your interest in SunPower©—the world’s most reliable solar! We look forward to hearing from you soon.
With many thanks,
Your Solar Advisor Team
1-844-877-8676 (1-844-US-SUNPOWER)
SolarAdvisors@sunpower.com
